EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Cognizant GAP Summit_Dubai_Q119.Cognizant Follow-up Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for visiting the Pivotal and Dell Technologies Booth at GAPS 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for stopping by the Pivotal and Dell Technologies booth at GAPS 2019. We hope you found it informative as you explore the Cognizant-Pivotal partnership and related go-to-market opportunities. We’re excited to work closely with you to support our joint customers on their Digital Transformation journeys and help them achieve successful business outcomes by transforming the way they build software.
To stay up-to-date on the latest happenings at Pivotal, subscribe to our monthly partner newsletter <[[http://info.pivotal.io/n0I00BX020AN0JU00N00Cd0]]> (scroll to the bottom of the page). It includes PCF training and enablement opportunities, successful customer stories, tips for co-marketing with Pivotal, and more. And check out the below assets to learn even more about Pivotal and our customers.
- Webinar: 10 Habits of Successful Digital Transformers with Pivotal and Cognizant <[[https://event.on24.com/eventRegistration/console/EventConsoleApollo.jsp?&eventid=1830107&sessionid=1&username=&partnerref=Pivotal&format=fhvideo1&mobile=false&flashsupportedmobiledevice=false&helpcenter=false&key=FC9B758B0922C4ECA499872EFD9213F1&text_language_id=en&playerwidth=1000&playerheight=650&overwritelobby=y&eventuserid=228004785&contenttype=A&mediametricsessionid=190178496&mediametricid=2577341&usercd=228004785&mode=launch]]> - White Paper: Supersonic Application Development and Delivery with Spring Boot and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/content-library/supersonic-application-development-and-delivery-with-spring-boot-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> - Podcast: Pumping the Digital Transformation Bunny at the US Air Force, with Bryon Kroger <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pumping-the-digital-transformation-bunny-at-the-us-air-force-with-bryon-kroger]]> - Blog: Kubernetes … One Cluster or Many? <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/kubernetes-one-cluster-or-many]]>
If you would like more information or have any questions about the Pivotal-Cognizant partnership, please contact your local Cognizant Digital Engineering team or leave your name and contact information here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Please indicate which account or vertical sector you are aligned to and the information about the Cognizant-Pivotal partnership you are interested in. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management.html]]>.
